<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spectacles of Understanding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=882)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 117</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All characters have access to this item_

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These folding, wood-framed spectacles hold flat discs of cut crystal as lenses and are held in place with thin cords that wrap around each ear, with another strap holding them around the neck while not in use. While you are wearing the spectacles, you gain a +1 item bonus to checks to [Decipher Writing](/Actions.aspx?ID=22).

<document level="2" id="action-643" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Spectacles of Understanding (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 117</row>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +2, and the ability to _comprehend writing_ from comprehend language lasts until you fold up the spectacles or the item is no longer invested by you, whichever comes first, rather than lasting 1 hour.
